description:
Our HUGE, clean, comfortable studio is in the coolest part Brooklyn!  Steps away from endless bars, art galleries, restaurants and music venues.  Close to trains.  Come play in the new center of the world.

Private entrance and bathroom. Comfortably fits 3 with a queen bed with hotel quality linens.  I will leave extra linens for the fold down futon per request :) The bathroom is equipped with spa grade towels and will be stocked with soaps, shampoo and conditioner for your use.  Has microwave and mini fridge.

Secure, clean building with private entrance to your room. Microwave and mini fridge.  Private bathroom.

Available at any time for questions or assistance. :)

Artsy, great nightlife, always something happening!

5 minute walk to L train and J train

This is similar to a hotel room with no kitchen. Lots of great restaurants nearby.
name: Hello, Brooklyn!
review: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
